author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Hollow Knight: Silksong is barely two weeks away, and gamers seem to be flooding back to the original in preparation. According to SteamDB, 2017's Hollow Knight hit an all-time concurrent high with 23,840 players this week. While it's not the most concurrents across all Steam games, it is a franchise peak. In other news, Donkey Kong Bananza's somewhat controversial control scheme came at the suggestion of Donkey Kong creator Shigeru Miyamoto. Bananza's game director, Kazuya Takahashi, revealed that it was Miyamoto's idea, but they left the option to swap the 'punch down' and 'jump' buttons in case players had a hard time re-wiring their muscle memory.

Presented by Universal Orlando Resort and its new theme park, Universal Epic Universe.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Hollow Knight Reaches New Franchise Record on Steam - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
gamescom 2025 is the BIGGEST gamescom yet! But how BIG actually is gamescom 2025? Join us for a BIG tour of the BIGGEST and best booths, games and more that attendees could experience throughout the show's heaving halls! BIIIIIIG!

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: Just How BIG is gamescom? Let's Find Out | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at gameplay from Europa Universalis V in this exclusive video for the next entry in the historical grand strategy game series. In Europa Universalis V, use war, trade or diplomacy to satisfy your grandest ambitions and dominate five centuries of history. Europa Universalis V will be available on PC on November 4, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Europa Universalis V - Exclusive Gameplay | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Deep in uncharted space, your expedition took a challenging turn when your ship crash-landed. Master complex simulations to keep your outspoken explorers alive, face unpredictable challenges, and figure out a way back home. Check out the Adaptory trailer for this upcoming base-building, colony sim game to see features, gameplay, and what you can expect. 
Adaptory will be available on PC.

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Adaptory - Official Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Yooka-Replaylee teaser trailer for this upcoming enhanced definitive version of the open-world 3D platforming collectathon adventure starring Yooka and Laylee. Yooka-Replaylee features new challenges, secrets, mechanics, and accessibility options. Stay tuned for more information during The MIX Fall Showcase when it airs on August 29, 2025 (9 AM PT).

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Yooka-Replaylee - Official Teaser Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get a fresh look at Wraith Ops in this latest trailer for the upcoming action FPS game featuring objective-based combat with a focus on teamwork and skill. The new Wraith Ops trailer showcases gameplay, the assault class, the specialist class, and the heavy class. 
Wraith Ops will be available on PC via Steam.

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Wraith Ops - Official Class Gameplay Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Zero Parades follows in the footsteps of the much-loved Disco Elysium, building on the systems introduced in the original and elevating them to the next level, but is shifting the focus from detective work to espionage. Writer and VO director Jim Ashilevi joins us discuss how it differs from its predecessor, how you constantly change your persona to keep your identity covered up and the espionage thrillers that inspired the game. 

Zero Parades is coming to PC but no release date has yet been announced.

IGN's gamescom 2025 coverage is presented by Metal Eden.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Zero Parades Turns an Identity Crisis Into a Game Mechanic | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Ex-Witcher 3 devs have come together to create The Blood of Dawnwalker, an epic RPG where your protagonist lives as a human in the day but turns into a vampire at night. With a unique day/night cycle and just 30 in-game days to save your family, it's a fascinating spin on a familiar type of game where the stakes have never been higher. At gamescom 2025 IGN watched developer Rebel Wolves play through the same quest twice, demonstrating the significant differences between approaching objectives in the day versus at night. 

The Blood of Dawnwalker is an open world, dark fantasy RPG coming to PC and console in 2026.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: The Blood of Dawnwalker Is a High Stakes Vampire Game | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
We got to operate a real-life PVKK cannon cockpit, and it was amazing! This immersive controller let's you toggle tactile switches, adjust mechanical dials and dutifully line up the trajectory of the in-game cannon to take on the invading interplanetary forces. 

Papers, Please-like conflicts of interest mixed with Steel Battalion-esque button pushing? It's a stressful cocktail, playable in the form of PVKK: Planetenverteidigungskanonenkommandant! You take control of a planetary defense cannon for an autocratic regime, complete with tactile button pressing, and sweat-inducing defense systems, all designed to protect your world from interplanetary invasion.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: PVKK: We Played it With a Real-Life Cannon Cockpit! | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Previously known as Project LLL, Cinder City is a sci-fi MMO shooter that's bursting with action. It's got jetpacks, zombies, mechs, motorbikes, machine-guns, monsters and lots of other things that begin with M. Bigfire Games project lead James Bay and project manager and translator Ga Hae Shin sat down with IGN at gamescom 2025 to talk about what we can expect from Cinder City and how it's looking to move the MMO shooter genre forward.

Cinder City is coming to PC and consoles in 2026.

IGN's gamescom 2025 coverage is presented by Borderlands 4.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: How Cinder City Blends Cyberpunk Action With an MMO Shooter | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
LEGO Voyagers is a wonderful two-player co-op puzzle game that takes its cues from Split Fiction, as a pair of bricks work together to rescue an abandoned spaceship. Creative Director Karsten Lund explains why Light Brick Studios chose bricks as a lead character over minifigs, how they're balancing it to be accessible to all ages and abilities, and how LEGO was involved in making the game.

LEGO Voyagers is coming to PlayStation, Xbox and PC on September 15, 2025.

#gamescom2025
title: LEGO Voyagers’ Co-Op Gameplay is Like Split Fiction With Bricks | gamescom 2025

title: Invincible VS references Presented by @VOIDInteractive #gamescom2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out our first look at Routine gameplay, a new survival horror game coming late 2025!
Routine is a first-person survival horror game developed by Lunar Software. Explore murky and dark environments with a suite of tactile technology to engage what lurks in the dark and make it out alive in the process. Routine is coming late 2025 for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Game Pass, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: Routine - Gameplay (first look!) | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Following the announcement that Hatsune Miku, Joker from Persona and SpongeBob will be racing alongside Sonic and pals, everyone's favorite pill-muncher has now joined the line-up too. Takashi Iizuka, Sonic creative officer, and Yuji Yoshii, producer for Pac-Man World 1 & 2 Re-Pac, talk about how Pac-Man came to star in Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds and tease some of the characters Sonic fans are desperate to see in the game.

Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds is coming to PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch and PC on September 25, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: What Pac-Man is Bringing to Sonic Racing: CrossWorld's All-Star Line-Up | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Super Meat Boy 3D is the return of the chunky, platforming mass of meat, but how does the transition to 3D alter the gameplay? We spoke to Co-Founder/Art Director, Dominik Plaßmann to find out more.

IGN's gamescom 2025 coverage is presented by Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 - Legacy of the Forge

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Does the Super Meat Boy Formula Translate to 3D Gameplay? | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
If you thought guns that spat curse words more frequently than bullets was a bit too out there, you're not ready for High of Life 2. This foul-mouthed follow-up is packed with crazy new weapons, enemy-riddled worlds to explore and a bunch of new expletives that'll make anyone who listens blush. We grabbed Squanch's chief creative officer Mikey Spano and COO Matty Studivan at gamescom 2025 to find out more about the sweary sequel. How did it get a skateboard? Why does it have Bible Adventures? Who's their dream voice actor to play a Gatlien? We asked the hard-hitting questions.

High on Life 2 is coming to Xbox, PC and PlayStation on February 13, 2026.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: High On Life 2: Skateboarding, Bible Adventures & Why They Couldn't Get Danny DeVito | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Romance is as important to RPGs as stats, dialogue, and choices these days, but what does love look like for a century-old vampire? That's what we'll find out in Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2, the long-awaited RPG sequel arriving in October. To learn more about romantic biting, plus how skills help build your perfect elder vampire, we spoke to Ian Thomas, Project Narrative Director at developer The Chinese Room, and Jason Carl, Brand Marketing Manager for White Wolf at Paradox Interactive. They gave use a closer look at how you'll navigate the World of Darkness and how they've created a worthy follow-up to a cult RPG. 

Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 is coming PlayStation, Xbox and PC to October 21, 2025.

IGN's gamescom 2025 coverage is presented by Metal Eden.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2's Romance is Not What You Expect | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
After first being announced in 2012, we've finally played Routine, the upcoming survival horror game developed by Lunar Software.

What do we think, and is Routine scary? Watch this video to find out all that more about our hands-on time with Routine gameplay.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Routine: We Finally Played After 13 Years of Waiting! | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
We spoke to Series Producer Okamoto-san and Director Al Yang about Silent Hill f's controversial new combat system and why Silent Hill f gameplay isn't really a souls-like even though it shares a few similarities. How does Silent Hill f combat actually work, why is Hinako so nimble, what kind of effects occur when she runs out of stamina mid boss fight and, most importantly, why playing the game through on story mode first will be beneficial to you enjoying the game to its fullest.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Here's Why You Shouldn't Be Scared Of Silent Hill f's Combat | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Dying Light has always had a reputation for being savage but Dying Light: The Beast cranks the brutality up to new heights. Dying Light franchise director Tymon Smektala talks about how the new Beast Mode changes the familiar Dying Light formula, why Kyle Crane returns as the game's protagonist and what we can expect when the sun goes down and all hell breaks loose.

Dying Light: The Beast is coming to PlayStation, Xbox and PC on September 19, 2025.

IGN's gamescom 2025 coverage is presented by Borderlands 4.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: How Dying Light: The Beast Cranks The Brutality Up to 11 | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Between the Original Snake Eater, Subsistence, Snake Eater 3D, the Legacy Collection, and the Master Collection, there have been a ton of releases of Metal Gear Solid 3. But the biggest update of all of them is probably Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater, the new Unreal Engine 5 remake. 

From updated weapon handling, to controls, and quality of life updates, here are the biggest changes we spotted in the final game.

Thanks to World of Longplays and Spazbo4 for use of their footage!
https://www.youtube.com/@worldoflongplays
www.longplays.org
Played by: Spazbo4

Timecodes:
Intro - 00:00
Updated Controls - 0:46
Updated Movement - 2:18
Updated Animations - 3:21
Camo Menu - 3:46
Codec (I Mean Radio) Calls - 4:15
Photo Mode - 5:07
More Than Just Kerotans - 5:24
You Have A Compass - 5:46
On-Screen Pop Ups - 6:02
Classic Camera Comes At A Cost - 6:47
The Secret Theater Has Collectible Reels - 7:14
You Can Reload Saves Much Faster - 8:15
Outro - 9:17
title: Metal Gear Solid Delta - 12 Biggest Changes From the Original

author: IGN
description:
What would you sacrifice to become the greatest of all time? 
From Oscar winner Jordan Peele and Monkeypaw Productions, producers of the landmark horror films Get Out, Us, Candyman and Nope, comes a chilling journey into the inner sanctum of fame, idolatry, and the pursuit of excellence at any cost, featuring an electrifying dramatic performance from Marlon Wayans (Air, Respect).
HIM stars former college wide-receiver Tyriq Withers (Atlanta, the upcoming I Know What You Did Last Summer) as Cameron Cade, a rising-star quarterback who has devoted his life, and identity, to football. On the eve of professional football’s annual scouting Combine, Cam is attacked by an unhinged fan and suffers a potentially career-ending brain trauma.
Just when all seems lost, Cam receives a lifeline when his hero, Isaiah White (Marlon Wayans), a legendary eight-time Championship quarterback and cultural megastar, offers to train Cam at Isaiah’s isolated compound that he shares with his celebrity influence
title: HIM - Official Behind the Scenes Clip (2025) Marlon Wayans, Tyriq Withers

author: IGN
description:
The wait is almost over! Hollow Knight: Silksong is arriving on September 4, 2025, but whether you’re jumping back into Hallownest or diving in for the very first time, you’ll want to be ready. In this video, we cover 12 essential tips to help you survive, explore, and master the original Hollow Knight before the sequel drops.

From mastering the down slash to using your Soul wisely, finding maps and charms, and uncovering hidden secrets, these tips will make your journey through Hallownest smoother and more rewarding. Perfect for new players or anyone looking to brush up before Silksong arrives.

#IGN #HollowKnight #Silksong
title: Playing Hollow Knight Before Silksong? Use These 12 Helpful Tips

author: IGN
description:
Check out 30 minutes of Crimson Desert, picking up shortly after the tutorial in our demo session during Gamescom 2025 for the upcoming Openworld Action Adventure RPG. 

Our latest footage showcases artillery strikes, and elemental powers such as lightning and Ice all culminating in a boss fight against Cassius Morten. Crimson Desert will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC (Steam), and Mac.

#IGN #CrimsonDesert #ActionRPG
title: Crimson Desert - 30 minutes of 4K Gameplay | gamescom 2025

#gamescom2025

author: IGN
description:
We sat down with Masaaki Hayasaka, producer of Dragon Quest 1+2 HD 2D Remake, and translator Gavin Poffley to talk about game lengths, the Princess of Cannock's role in the party and combat, the return of Tombola, a hypothetical visual makeover for Final Fantasy VI, and more!
Dragon Quest 1+2 HD 2D Remake is coming to PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch and PC on October 30, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Dragon Quest 1+2 HD 2D Remake: Game Length, Princess of Cannock, & Tombola  | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description: Watch the ‘House of 2K’ Live Action Trailer for NBA 2K26, the latest addition to the basketball simulation franchise developed by Visual Concepts. The legendary Spike Lee takes players through the House of 2K, which chronicles the essence of the game of basketball from iconic moments. NBA 2K26 is launching on September 5 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC.
title: NBA 2K26 - Official Live Action Trailer (Ft. Spike Lee)

author: IGN
description: Watch the Gameplay Overview Trailer for Of Ash and Steel, a third-person action open-world RPG developed by Fire & Frost. Players will experience an authentic old-school RPG feel with modern sensibilities as they explore the Kingdom of the Seven. Don't miss the latest trailer to get a sense of the gameplay from taking on main missions, crafting, and taking on enemies in melee-based combat. Of Ash and Steel is coming soon to PC (Steam).
title: Of Ash and Steel - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer
